project.name: Tenerife.Music UI Component Library
project.description: Main master task file for Tenerife.Music UI component library. Controls all roadmap stages (1-8) for component development, Storybook integration, testing, documentation, npm publishing, CI/CD, and maintenance.
global_guidelines: Always read docs/PROJECT_PROGRESS.md first - it is the canonical source of truth
Use docs/UNFINISHED_TASKS.md to track remaining work
Execute tasks sequentially unless explicitly parallel
Update docs/PROJECT_PROGRESS.md after each completed stage
Follow component structure: ComponentName.tsx, ComponentName.types.ts, ComponentName.test.tsx, ComponentName.stories.tsx
Always create Storybook stories for components

date_handling_rules.description: Cursor must use real project dates. Forbidden to generate artificial dates. Forbidden to automatically set update date unless user explicitly requests.
conditions: If date is required - use current system date
If historical date is required - ask user if unknown
If file had incorrect date - replace with TODO:DATE_CONFIRMATION
